quote_first:
I remember the cigarette in his hard face, against the now limitless storm cloud. Bernardo cried to him unexpectedly: “What time is it, Ireno?”
Without consulting the sky, without stopping, he replied: “It’s
quote_last: , young Bernardo Juan Franciso.” His voice was shrill, mocking.
title: Funes the Memorious-Labyrinths
author: Jorge Luis Borges
